Html: I have tried searching for my answer but I did not find it. Why is it that items I pick up while questing are not shown in rawr? I have the option checked to import everything..(equipped, bags, bank). All it shows is what I have equipped and then items that are greatly superior to what I have equipped. I haven't played wow since WOLK so i would think that some of the quest items I acquire would be marginaly better than the gear i currently have equipped. I also have all of the filters checked. Is there something I'm missing?
Only items that are in item cache will be shown. That is to prevent clutter mainly. If you need those items you can add them from the item editor.
